ue5_fundamentals.engine_architecture: UE5 Engine architecture, systems, and core components
ue5_fundamentals.blueprint_system: Visual scripting system for creating game logic without coding
ue5_fundamentals.materials_shaders: Material creation, shader graphs, and visual effects
ue5_fundamentals.animation_system: Character animation, state machines, and motion capture
ue5_fundamentals.physics_simulation: Real-time physics, collision detection, and dynamics

business_applications.visualization_dashboards: 3D data visualization and interactive business dashboards
business_applications.immersive_interfaces: VR/AR business applications and user interfaces
business_applications.real_time_collaboration: Multi-user business environments and collaboration tools
business_applications.training_simulations: Employee training and skill development environments

training_objectives: Understand UE5 engine architecture and core systems
Master Blueprint visual scripting for business automation
Integrate UE5 with external business systems

assessment_criteria.knowledge_retention: Demonstrate understanding of UE5 core concepts
assessment_criteria.practical_application: Successfully create functional UE5 business applications
assessment_criteria.integration_capability: Connect UE5 with existing business systems
assessment_criteria.innovation_potential: Generate novel UE5 business use cases

practical_projects.name: Interactive Business Dashboard
practical_projects.description: Create a 3D data visualization dashboard using UE5
practical_projects.deliverable: Functional UE5 project with real-time data integration

practical_projects.name: Automated Workflow Visualization
practical_projects.description: Build a Blueprint-based business process automation
practical_projects.deliverable: Working automation system with visual feedback
